statements: SELECT * FROM Merchants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT merchant_name, city FROM Merchants WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT merchant_name, address, city FROM Merchants WHERE zip_code = '90210';
SELECT * FROM Merchants WHERE state = 'Texas' ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_merchants FROM Merchants;
SELECT * FROM Merchants WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY'
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name, city FROM Merchants ORDER BY merchant_name
SELECT * FROM Merchants WHERE state IN ('CA', 'TX', 'FL') ORDER BY merchant_id DESC
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name, address, city, state FROM Merchants WHERE zip_code LIKE '90%'
SELECT merchant_name, address FROM Merchants WHERE city = 'San Francisco'
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchants WHERE merchant_type = 'Online';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_type FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, payment_date FROM merchants JOIN payments ON merchants.merchant_id = payments.merchant_id;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location, merchant_type FROM merchants WHERE merchant_type = 'Online' ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, payment_date FROM merchants JOIN payments ON merchants.merchant_id = payments.merchant_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE merchant_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_phone FROM merchants WHERE merchant_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE merchant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN merchants ON transactions.merchant_id = merchants.merchant_id;
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT merchant_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM merchants JOIN products ON merchants.merchant_id = products.merchant_id GROUP BY merchant_name;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, merchant_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN merchants ON orders.merchant_id = merchants.merchant_id;
SELECT * FROM merchant;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchant ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product WHERE merchant_id = 2 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM order WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchant WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM `order` WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_item_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_item ORDER BY quantity ASC;
